name: Reference - System and method for managed security assessment and mitigation
x_kb_abstract: In an embodiment of the invention, a system for assessing vulnerabilities includes: a security management system; a network device in a system under test (SUT), wherein the network device is privy to traffic in the SUT; and wherein the SMS is privy to traffic that is known by the network device and/or to one or more traffic observations that is known by the network device.
x_kb_reference_title: System and method for managed security assessment and mitigation
